hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via Regulatory Clarity Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regime, following 2+ consecutive weeks of positive regulatory developments (MiCA implementation progress, constructive FCA consultations), breakout above 3-month price range high on expanding volume signals BULL regime with 75% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current regulatory environment (MiCA, UK consultations, 2025/26 outlook) provides fundamental catalyst for institutional adoption. Neutral regimes with regulatory catalysts have historically preceded sustained bull moves as uncertainty premium evaporates. $87,369 BTC represents consolidation near all-time highs.
entry_conditions: ≥2 positive regulatory developments in past 10 trading days
Positive funding rates across major exchanges

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price falls back into range (below range high - 1%)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days without continuation above breakout level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Regulatory catalysts fail to generate sustained buying pressure in >25% of cases OR false breakouts occur despite positive developments.
